info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of Private Equity orders
info.title: Order Private Equity Order APIs

parameters.name: privateEquityOrderId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Private Equity Order

parameters.name: privateEquityOrderId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Private Equity Order

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: privateEquityOrderId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Private Equity Order

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

depositoryId.description: The identifier of the depository. Must be a customerSecurity of type depository.

counterpartyId.description: The identifier of the counter party

counterPartyAccountId.description: The identifier of the counter party's account

status.description: Get a detail status of the specified service/services

adviceRequired.description: Indicates if the advice will be generated for this transaction

commissionRate.description: The commission by percentage. Allowed only for manual commission. Calculated commission amount can be overwritten manually.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
